content: The most rewarding thing for Lori has been assisting patients in resolving complex issues and ensuring they get the best quality care in DCC. Linkedin Lanre Alausa Vice President of Value-Based and Integrated Care Lanre Alausa is currently the Vice President of Value-Based and Integrated Care for Kidney Care Center and Dialysis Care Center. He has more than 13 years of experience in the dialysis space. Lanreâ€™s positive relationships with external partners are instrumental in the thriving business operations of both our organizations (KCC and DCC) and our partners. He is also responsible for implementing and managing the collaborative Value-Based Care programs between the Dialysis Care Center, Kidney Care Center, Government, and Private Health Plans such as The Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation Models (CKCC, ETC) and all other Value-Based Programs.Lanre holds an MBA degree with an emphasis in Financial Management. He is also a Healthcare Financial Management Association (HFMA) member. Linkedin Salman Azam General Counsel Salman Azam serves as General Counsel for the Dialysis Care Center. He manages all legal personnel and legal matters for the company, including all transactional work, regulatory affairs, compliance, and labor and employment issues.
title: Leadership - Dialysis Care Center
